front.title: Use Cases for Content Delivery Network Interconnection

abstract.t: Content Delivery Networks (CDNs) are commonly used for improving the End User experience of a content delivery service, at a reasonable cost. This document outlines real world use cases (not technical solutions) for interconnecting CDNs. It can be used to provide guidance to the CDNI WG about the interconnection arrangements to be supported and to validate the requirements of the various CDNI interfaces.
